statute: Ark. Code § 16‑10‑701 (Additional fees for specialty court programs)
description: Authorizes courts to assess a **specialty court program user fee** of up to $250 on participants in specialty court programs and a **public defender user fee** of up to $250 for participants represented by a public defender. These fees are remitted to the Administration of Justice Funds Section for deposit into the Specialty Court Program Fund and Public Defender User Fees Fund.  The section defines terms such as “pre‑adjudication” and lists the types of approved specialty court programs【214151642646704†L71-L109】.
